meanings.definition: A person of mixed Indigenous and European ancestry.
meanings.sent1: My friend is proud of her Metis heritage.
meanings.sent2: The Metis community celebrates their unique culture.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, he dressed up as a Metis superhero.
meanings.sent4: The blending of Indigenous and European traditions created a Metis identity.
meanings.sent5: The Metis flag symbolizes unity and diversity.

meanings.definition: A member of a group of people in Canada who are of mixed Indigenous and European descent.
meanings.sent1: She learned about the Metis in her Canadian history class.
meanings.sent2: Metis individuals have contributed significantly to Canadian society.
meanings.sent3: The Metis chef prepared a fusion dish blending Indigenous and European flavors.
meanings.sent4: In the painting, the artist depicted the Metis as a bridge between two worlds.
meanings.sent5: The Metis settlement showcases the harmonious coexistence of different cultures.
